description: CSS file for managing themes and styles for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling for layout, typography, and responsiveness.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header style for the application, including layout and background color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including hover and active states.
